item.description:
Dear RIRUG Community,

Our next Rhode Island Revit Users Group Meetup focuses on the use of Autodesk Revit for rendering, visualization, and illustration, with a concentration also on integrating Sketchup functionality into the process.

Our panel and presenters will consist of Matthew Valero LEED AP, ASAI - Architectural Illustrator for Durkee, Brown, Viveiros and Werenfels; as well as a representative from Microdesk who will demonstrate and discuss Revit's native rendering capabilities and Sketchup integration. We may also have the benefit of some other guests.

This is a great opportunity to enhance your knowledge of this aspect of Revit (and Sketchup) use, as well as see some interesting graphics, network with other users and  members, and continue to build our user community!

There will be a separate discussion group for specific questions that people would like to discuss during the Q&A, please also feel free to respond to this email.

See you all there,

Andy Keating  / Stack Design Build

 

**This just in: The May meetup will be sponsored by Microdesk, who will be presenting and providing refreshments.**

Microdesk is a national organization that provides business and technology consulting using industry-leading software from Autodesk and Oracle to help firms successfully plan, design, build and operate land and buildings. Visit www.microdesk.com.
item.why: To understand Revit's native rendering capabilities and learn about some typical workflows for sketchup integration and rendering.
item.name: Revit for Rendering, Visualization and Architectural Illustration
